metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20749 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibVNC before 0.9.12 contains a heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in libvncserver/rfbserver.c. The fix for CVE-2018-15127 was incomplete.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20749` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.3
libvncserver-config - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1.3').
